roleset.name: keep track of
roleset.note: TABS-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on LVB-ON (from tabs.01-n)

example.name: both args, LVB
example.text: The SEC has only about 200 staffers assigned *PRO* to keep tabs on investment advisers -- about the same as in 1980 -- even though the number of advisers has tripled to about 15,000 over the past decade .
